{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.raspberrypi.org/products/raspberry-pi-3-model-b/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = RPF_Raspberry_Pi_3_Model_B |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = RPF |model = Raspberry Pi 3 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Model B (1GB) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 03/07/2016 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/RPF_Raspberry_Pi_3_Model_B |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2ABCB-RPI32 |icid = 20953-RPI32 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM2837;BCM2837RIFBG; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 (v8) |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Elpida;B8132B4PB-8D-F; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = SMSC;LAN9514;LAN9514-JZX; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Micro SD Card, USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth, HDMI out, A/V out (3.5mm), GPIO |addchip = Dual PWM Step Down DC-DC Converter;Diodes Inc.;PAM2306;;1;,,, 3-pin Microprocessor Reset Circuit;Diodes Inc;APX803;;1;,,, P-Channel Enhancement Mode MOSFET;Diodes Inc;DMG2305UX;;2;,,, 45V Matched Pair PNP Signal Transistor;Diodes Inc;BCM857BS;;1;,,, 2,7MHz, 3A Step-Down Converter w/I2C Interface;Richtek;RT8088A;;1;,,, Ultra High Speed Dual Buffer;On Semi;NCWZ16;;1;,,, 1.5A/0.7A High Side Power Switch for USB;Richtek;RT9741CVG;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Sony UK |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/26/2016 |estreldate = 02/2016 |estprice = 35 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = UK
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = SDIO |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43438; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|RPF Raspberry Pi series|List of SBCs}}
Apparently the Wi-Fi chip BCM43438 identifies itself :as BCM43430 (SDIO device ID a9a6)
==Links of Interest== {{WPLink|Raspberry Pi}} *[https://www.raspberrypi.org/blog/raspberry-pi-3-on-sale/ Blog] *[http://elinux.org/RaspberryPiBoard '''elinux.org''''s Raspberry Pi subsection] *[http://elinux.org/RaspberryPi_Boards Board revision table w/ pictures]
===Reviews=== *[http://www.cnx-software.com/2016/02/29/raspberry-pi-3-board-is-powered-by-broadcom-bcm2827-cortex-a53-processor-sells-for-35/ ''Raspberry Pi 3 Board is Powered by Broadcom BCM2837'' on '''CNX-Software'''] *[http://www.cnx-software.com/2016/03/01/raspberry-pi-3-odroid-c2-and-pine-a64-development-boards-comparison/ ''Raspberry Pi 3, ODROID-C2 and Pine A64+ Comparison'' on '''CNX-Software'''] *[http://blog.pimoroni.com/raspberry-pi-3/ ''Raspberry Pi 3 - First Look'' on '''Pimoroni''' blogs] *[https://www.raspberrypi.org/magpi/pi-3-interview/ ''Raspberry Pi 3 - Interview'' on '''MagPi''']
===Models=== :;[https://www.raspberrypi.com/products/ Raspberry Pi products] • [[RPF Raspberry Pi series]] *[[RPF Raspberry Pi Model B (256MB)]] • [https://www.raspberrypi.com/products/raspberry-pi-1-model-b/ PPage] • [http://www.opennet.ru/opennews/art.shtml?num=40202 ''OpenNet''] :[[Broadcom]] BCM2835 @700MHz 1x ARM1176JZF-S (ARMv6 ) : 256MB RAM, 2x USB 2.0 *[[RPF Raspberry Pi Model B (512MB)]] • [https://www.raspberrypi.com/products/raspberry-pi-1-model-b/ PPage] • [http://www.opennet.ru/opennews/art.shtml?num=40202 ''OpenNet''] :[[Broadcom]] BCM2835 @700MHz 1x ARM1176JZF-S (ARMv6 ) : 512MB RAM, 2x USB 2.0 *[[RPF Raspberry Pi Model B+ (512MB)]] • [https://www.raspberrypi.com/products/raspberry-pi-1-model-b-plus/ PPage] • [http://www.opennet.ru/opennews/art.shtml?num=40202 ''OpenNet''] :[[Broadcom]] BCM2835 @700MHz 1x ARM1176JZF-S (ARMv6) : 512MB RAM, 4x USB 2.0 *[[RPF Raspberry Pi 2 Model B (1GB)]] • [https://www.raspberrypi.org/products/raspberry-pi-2-model-b/ PPage] • [http://www.opennet.ru/opennews/art.shtml?num=41585 ''OpenNet''] :[[Broadcom]] BCM2836 @900MHz 4x ARM (Cortex-A7) (ARMv7) :1GB RAM, 4x USB 2.0
*[[RPF Raspberry Pi 3 Model A+]] • WLAN, no LAN, ($20) • [https://www.raspberrypi.com/products/raspberry-pi-3-model-a-plus/ PPage] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM2837 @1.4GHz Quad-core ARMv8 (64-bit) :[[ARM]] (Cortex-A53); 1GB RAM, 1x USB 2.0, Micro SD, HDMI :GPU: ''VideoCore IV'' @250MHz; FPU: VFPv4 + NEON; MIPI (CSI) :WLAN: [[Broadcom]] CYW43455 1T1R 802.11abgn/ac, BT 4.2 LE *[[RPF Raspberry Pi 3 Model B]] • [https://www.raspberrypi.org/products/raspberry-pi-3-model-b/ PPage] • [https://www.opennet.ru/opennews/art.shtml?num=43962 ''OpenNet''] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM2837 @1.2GHz Quad-core ARMv8 (64-bit) :[[ARM]] (Cortex-A53); 1GB RAM, 4x USB 2.0, Micro SD, FE, HDMI :GPU: ''VideoCore IV'' (@400MHz), 3D-core (@300MHz) :WLAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM43438 1T1R 802.11bgn, BT 4.1 LE *[[RPF Raspberry Pi 3 Model B+]] • [https://www.raspberrypi.org/products/raspberry-pi-3-model-b-plus/ PPage] • [https://www.opennet.ru/opennews/art.shtml?num=43962 ''OpenNet''] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM2837 @1.4GHz Quad-core ARMv8 (64-bit) :[[ARM]] (Cortex-A53); 1GB RAM, 4x USB 2.0, Micro SD, GbE, HDMI :GPU: ''VideoCore IV'' @250MHz; FPU: VFPv4 + NEON; MIPI (CSI) :WLAN: [[Broadcom]] CYW43455 1T1R 802.11abgn/ac, BT 4.2 LE
*[[RPF Raspberry Pi Zero]] • [https://www.raspberrypi.com/products/raspberry-pi-zero/ PPage] • [https://www.raspberrypi.org/blog/raspberry-pi-zero/ Blog] (half size ''Model A+'') :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM2835 @1.0GHz Single-core ARM11 :512MB RAM (Elpida B4432BBPA-10-F), Mini HDMI (1080p60) :Micro SD, USB OTG ports, Micro USB data/power, 40-pin GPIO
[[Category:English Documentation]]
